Date and timestamp fields are coded in the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 ISO 8601] standard, extended format. If the field name ends in "Date", only the date portion should be provided, for example "2017-06-16". If a field ends in "Timestamp", the date, time and time zone information needs to be provided, as in this example: "2017-06-16T14:47:23-0600". In version 1, milliseconds are not supported.

{| class="wikitable"
!
!Format
!Example
|-
|Date
|yyyy-MM-dd
|2017-06-16
|-
|Timestamp
|yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssz
|2017-06-16T14:47:23-0600
|-
|Timestamp UTC
|yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ
|2017-06-16T20:47:23Z
|}
